text: PJS, PJs or PJ's may refer to: * Pajamas, a form of clothing * PJS v News Group Newspapers Ltd * Peutz–Jeghers syndrome, a genetic disease * Air Force Pararescue (the para jumpers) of the US Air Force * P.J.'s, later the Starwood, a nightclub in West Hollywood, California, US * The PJs, a clay animated television series ** The PJs (soundtrack), a soundtrack album from the TV series * PJ Trailers, a US company Schools * Pusan Japanese School, now Busan Japanese School * Portland Japanese School ==See also== *PJ (disambiguation)
title: PJS
